module.name: Phonebook
module.description: Provides a phonebook which can be used as base for Caller ID Lookup and Speed Dial
module.changelog: *15.0.12* Packaging of ver 15.0.12 *15.0.11* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.10* FREEPBX-20388 Restoring backup into FreePBX 15 system is not flushing the previously existing asterisk phonebook entries. *15.0.9* FREEPBX-20292 phone book legacy restore error *15.0.8* FREEPBX-20063 - added confirmation prompt when clicking Empty Phonebook button *15.0.7* Fixing FREEPBX-19622 *15.0.6* fixing legacy restore *15.0.5* fixing legacy restore *15.0.4* FREEPBX-18900 Phonebook entries starting in E.164-format can't be deleted *15.0.3* Backup and Restore *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Backup 15
